summary: The Bella Pro Series Slim espresso machine is on sale for $49.99 at Best Buy for July 23 only. That's $100, or 66%, off.

title: iRobot enters a new era with a Roomba that finally auto-washes and dries its mop
content: The new Roomba Combo 10 Max is the first Roomba that washes and dries its own mopping pads. Pre-order it for $1,399.99.
summary: The new Roomba Combo 10 Max is the first Roomba that washes and dries its own mopping pads. Pre-order it for $1,399.99.

title: Amazon deal of the day: A new record-low price on Samsung's Galaxy Tab S6 Lite has surfaced
content: Amazon's best deals of the day on July 23 include the Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite, Amazon Omni Fire TV, LG gram 14, and Google Pixel Buds A.
summary: Amazon's best deals of the day on July 23 include the Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite, Amazon Omni Fire TV, LG gram 14, and Google Pixel Buds A.

title: Hurry to get the Google Pixel Watch 2 for the lowest price ever at Amazon
content: The Google Pixel Watch 2 is on sale at Amazon for just $269.99, $80 off the normal price of $349.99. That's a 23% discount.
summary: The Google Pixel Watch 2 is on sale at Amazon for just $269.99, $80 off the normal price of $349.99. That's a 23% discount.
